statements: UPDATE security_configurations SET device_name = 'Device1', software_version = '1.0' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_configurations SET security_protocol = 'WPA2', device_type = 'Router' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE security_configurations SET security_protocol = 'WPA2', device_name = 'Router1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_configurations SET device_type = 'Access Point', software_version = 'v2.0' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE security_configurations SET security_level = 3, last_update = '2023-09-28 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE application_settings SET setting_value = 'enabled', last_modified = '2023-09-28 10:45:00' WHERE app_name = 'AppXYZ';
UPDATE security_configurations SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', security_protocol = 'WPA2' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Room 101', is_active = true WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE security_configurations SET security_protocol = 'TLS' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_devices SET is_active = true, device_name = 'NewDeviceName' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE network_devices SET ip_address='192.168.1.100', port=8080, status=true WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE device_settings SET setting_value='new_value' WHERE setting_id=3;
UPDATE network_devices SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', port = 8080 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_settings SET setting_value = 'enabled' WHERE setting_id = 5;
UPDATE security_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device 1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE user_permissions SET permission_level = 3 WHERE user_id = 1 AND device_id = 2;
UPDATE security_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device Name', device_type = 'Updated Device Type' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE applications SET app_description = 'Updated App Description', app_vendor = 'Updated App Vendor' WHERE app_id = 2;
